title: Hot Baked Fruit
ingredients:
2 sliced apples
Â½ (11 oz.) package dried apricots
1 (13 oz.) can chunk pineapple, undrained
1 can cherry pie filling
1 can pears
1 tablespoon brown sugar
1 teaspoon cinnamon
4 tablespoons butter
steps:
Drain pears
Mix all ingredients together except for butter
Pour into casserole
Dot with butter
Bake at 325 covered for 50 minutes
Bake uncovered for 15 minutes more
Serve warm
notes: Especially good in the winter and fall
